title: Food made in space
description: Could plant growth studies in the ISS help feed people on Earth in the future?

vocabItems.definition: LED lightelectronic device that lights up when electricity is passed through it - abbreviation of ‘light emitting diode’
the distance between two waves of light which makes things appear to us in the different colours of the rainbow
microgravityweaker pull of gravity in space, making things float and seem weightless
ability of a plant to adapt to and cope with changes in the environment by changing its biological structure
chemicals and DNA in the cells of plants and animals which control their development and behaviour
